title: Creating New Account Broken?
body: Ok so I finished putting in details for a new account but once I enter the information it says "Your Sign Up Failed!" on a new page. This hasn't happened before, so can you give me any reasons on these happenings, thanks!

replies.body:
Hey dimcham,

Can you:

1. Verify that there are green checkmarks next to all of the fields after you enter that information in
2. Try using another browser like Internet Explorer and see if that works
Hey thanks for the tips. I think I may have found the problem though. Apparently you can't use the same email for two accounts. Using a different email fixed the problem completely!
